description:
### **"10X UPGRADE"** - MAXIMUM SPECIFICATION PROMPT

**OLYMPUS ULTIMATE BUILD PROMPT v4.0 - INCORPORATING ALL 22 SECTIONS (50X ENHANCED)**

**PLATFORM OVERVIEW:**
Build the complete OLYMPUS platform as the ultimate all-in-one development ecosystem, incorporating every specification from the 22-section technical guide. This is the maximum feature set - no compromises, no shortcuts.

**COMPLETE TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE (Section 1 - Tech Stack 50X):**

**Core Frontend Stack:**
- **React:** 18.2.0 with Concurrent Features, Suspense, Automatic Batching
- **TypeScript:** 5.3.0 with Strict Mode, Path Aliases (`@/*`), Advanced Config
- **Build Tool:** Vite 5.0.0 with HMR, ESM-native, Plugin Ecosystem
- **Vite Config:** Full optimization with manual chunks, sourcemaps, strict port

**Styling System (Complete Design System):**
- **Tailwind CSS:** 3.4.0 with Custom Design Tokens
- **Color System:** Brand palette (50 shades), Semantic colors (success/warning/error), Neutral grays
- **Typography:** Inter font family, Display sizes (2xl-4xl), Professional line heights, letter spacing
- **Spacing:** 8px base system, Custom values (4.5, 13, 15, 18, 22, 26, 30)
- **Border Radius:** lg (6px), xl (8px), 2xl (10px), 3xl (12px), 4xl (16px)
- **Shadows:** Soft shadows (xs-xl), Brand glows, Success/error glows
- **Animations:** fade-in, fade-in-up/down, slide-in-left/right, scale-in, spin-slow
- **Keyframes:** Custom animation definitions for smooth transitions

**PROMPTING & AI INTEGRATION (Section 2 - Prompting Bible 50X):**

**25 Golden Rules Implementation:**
1. **Specific & Explicit:** Every component defined with exact props, styling, behavior
2. **Professional Vocabulary:** Layout (flex items-center justify-center), Typography (text-2xl font-semibold), Colors (bg-blue-500 #3B82F6), Effects (shadow-lg), Animation (transition-all duration-300 ease-out)
3. **Architecture First:** Project structure, folder hierarchy, routing setup before features
4. **Context Awareness:** Brand memory, previous decisions, consistency enforcement
5. **Error Handling:** Graceful degradation, user feedback, retry mechanisms
6. **Performance Focus:** Code splitting, lazy loading, optimization patterns
7. **Accessibility:** ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support
8. **Testing Mindset:** Testable code, mock data, error scenarios
9. **Documentation:** Inline comments, README, API docs
10. **Security First:** Input validation, XSS prevention, CSRF protection

**Complete Vocabulary System:**
- **Layout:** flex flex-row gap-4, grid grid-cols-3 gap-6, ml-auto, justify-between
- **Typography:** font-bold (700), text-muted-foreground, uppercase tracking-wide
- **Colors:** bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600, hover:bg-blue-600, opacity-80
- **Effects:** shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)], backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80
- **Animation:** animate-fade-in, hover:scale-105 transition-transform

**UNIVERSAL WORKFLOW (Section 3 - Workflow 50X):**

**10-Phase Development Process:**
1. **Discovery & Research:** Market research templates, competitor analysis matrix, technology stack evaluation
2. **Requirements & PRD:** User stories, acceptance criteria, technical specifications
3. **Architecture & Design:** System design, database schema, API contracts
4. **Wireframing & Prototyping:** UI mockups, user flows, interaction design
5. **Environment Setup:** Development environment, CI/CD pipelines, deployment infrastructure
6. **Build Sequence:** Component development, feature integration, code review
7. **Testing & QA:** Unit tests, integration tests, performance testing, security audit
8. **Code Review & Documentation:** Peer review, documentation generation, knowledge base
9. **Deployment & CI/CD:** Automated deployment, environment management, rollback procedures
10. **Monitoring & Maintenance:** Performance monitoring, error tracking, user feedback integration

**BACKEND SYSTEMS (Section 4 - Backend System 50X):**
- **Supabase Integration:** Real-time subscriptions, Row Level Security, Edge Functions
- **Database Design:** PostgreSQL with optimized schemas, indexes, foreign keys
- **API Architecture:** RESTful endpoints, GraphQL support, rate limiting
- **Authentication:** JWT tokens, refresh mechanisms, social login integration
- **Authorization:** Role-based access, permission systems, audit trails
- **Caching:** Redis integration, query optimization, CDN integration
- **Background Jobs:** Queue systems, cron jobs, event-driven processing

**AUTHENTICATION FORTRESS (Section 5 - Authentication 50X):**
- **Multi-Factor Authentication:** TOTP, SMS, email verification
- **Social Login:** Google, GitHub, Facebook, Twitter integration
- **Password Policies:** Strength requirements, breach checking, reset flows
- **Session Management:** Secure cookies, refresh tokens, automatic logout
- **Account Recovery:** Secure reset links, verification codes, rate limiting
- **Security Features:** Brute force protection, suspicious activity detection
- **Compliance:** GDPR, CCPA compliance with data export/deletion

**DATABASE ARCHITECTURE (Section 6 - Database 50X):**
- **Schema Design:** Normalized tables, relationships, constraints
- **Performance:** Indexing strategies, query optimization, connection pooling
- **Migrations:** Version control, rollback procedures, data seeding
- **Backup & Recovery:** Automated backups, point-in-time recovery, disaster recovery
- **Monitoring:** Query performance, connection health, storage usage
- **Security:** Encryption at rest, access controls, audit logging

**API MASTERY (Section 7 - API 50X):**
- **RESTful Design:** Resource-based URLs, HTTP methods, status codes
- **GraphQL Integration:** Schema design, resolvers, query optimization
- **Documentation:** OpenAPI 3.0 specs, interactive documentation
- **Rate Limiting:** Tiered limits, burst handling, fair usage policies
- **Caching:** HTTP caching, CDN integration, cache invalidation
- **Webhooks:** Event-driven architecture, retry mechanisms, security
- **Versioning:** API versioning strategies, backward compatibility

**PAYMENT INTEGRATION (Section 8 - Payment 50X):**
- **Stripe Integration:** Subscriptions, one-time payments, webhooks
- **PayPal Support:** Express checkout, recurring billing
- **Multi-Currency:** Currency conversion, localization
- **Tax Calculation:** Automated tax rates, compliance
- **Subscription Management:** Plans, upgrades, cancellations, proration
- **Payment Methods:** Cards, digital wallets, bank transfers
- **Reporting:** Transaction analytics, revenue tracking

**TESTING & QA (Section 9 - Testing 50X):**
- **Unit Testing:** Jest framework, 90%+ coverage, mock strategies
- **Integration Testing:** API testing, database testing, end-to-end flows
- **Performance Testing:** Load testing, stress testing, benchmark targets
- **Security Testing:** Vulnerability scanning, penetration testing
- **Accessibility Testing:** WCAG compliance, screen reader testing
- **Cross-Browser Testing:** Compatibility matrix, automated testing
- **CI/CD Integration:** Automated test pipelines, quality gates

**UI COMPONENT SYSTEM (Section 10 - UI 50X):**
- **Component Library:** shadcn/ui foundation with custom extensions
- **Design System:** Consistent patterns, reusable components
- **Responsive Design:** Mobile-first approach, breakpoint system
- **Accessibility:** ARIA compliance, keyboard navigation, focus management
- **Theming:** Light/dark mode, custom themes, CSS variables
- **Animation System:** Micro-interactions, loading states, transitions
- **Form System:** Validation, error handling, submission states

**MOBILE DEVELOPMENT (Section 11 - Mobile 50X):**
- **React Native:** Native iOS/Android apps, Expo integration
- **Flutter Alternative:** Cross-platform development option
- **PWA Support:** Progressive web apps, offline capabilities
- **App Store Deployment:** Build automation, store submissions
- **Device Testing:** Simulator testing, physical device support
- **Native Features:** Camera, GPS, notifications, biometric auth
- **Performance:** Optimized bundles, lazy loading, memory management

**DEPLOYMENT COMMAND CENTER (Section 12 - Deployment 50X):**
- **Multi-Cloud Support:** Vercel, Netlify, AWS, GCP, Azure
- **CI/CD Pipelines:** GitHub Actions, automated testing, deployment
- **Environment Management:** Development, staging, production isolation
- **Scaling:** Auto-scaling, load balancing, CDN integration
- **Monitoring:** Performance metrics, error tracking, alerting
- **Rollback Procedures:** Version management, quick recovery
- **Security:** SSL certificates, firewall rules, access controls

**VERSION CONTROL MASTERY (Section 13 - Version Control 50X):**
- **Git Workflow:** Branching strategies, merge requests, code review
- **Repository Management:** Access controls, automation, integrations
- **Release Management:** Semantic versioning, changelog generation
- **Collaboration:** Team workflows, conflict resolution, documentation
- **Automation:** Commit hooks, automated testing, deployment triggers
- **Security:** Signed commits, vulnerability scanning, access logging

**SECURITY CHECKLIST (Section 14 - Security 50X):**
- **Application Security:** Input validation, XSS prevention, CSRF protection
- **Infrastructure Security:** Network security, container security, secrets management
- **Data Security:** Encryption, access controls, compliance
- **Authentication Security:** Password policies, session security, MFA
- **API Security:** Rate limiting, authentication, authorization
- **Monitoring:** Security events, threat detection, incident response
- **Compliance:** GDPR, SOC2, ISO 27001 requirements

**ADVANCED SECURITY (Section 15 - Security Checklist 50X):**
- **Threat Modeling:** Attack vectors, risk assessment, mitigation strategies
- **Vulnerability Management:** Scanning, patching, monitoring
- **Incident Response:** Detection, containment, recovery procedures
- **Security Training:** Developer education, best practices
- **Third-Party Risk:** Vendor assessment, supply chain security
- **Privacy Protection:** Data minimization, consent management, rights management

**HEADLESS COMMERCE (Section 16 - Headless Commerce 50X):**
- **API-First Architecture:** Composable commerce, microservices
- **Content Management:** CMS integration, multi-channel publishing
- **Personalization:** AI-driven recommendations, dynamic content
- **Internationalization:** Multi-language, multi-currency support
- **Performance:** Edge computing, global CDN, caching strategies
- **Integrations:** ERP systems, marketing tools, analytics platforms
- **Scalability:** Microservices architecture, event-driven processing

**WEB3 INTEGRATION (Section 17 - Web3 50X):**
- **Blockchain Integration:** Wallet connections, smart contract interactions
- **NFT Support:** Minting, trading, marketplace features
- **Cryptocurrency Payments:** Multiple token support, gas optimization
- **Decentralized Storage:** IPFS integration, content addressing
- **DAO Features:** Governance, voting, treasury management
- **Security:** Private key management, transaction signing
- **Compliance:** Regulatory requirements, KYC integration

**DEBUGGING PROTOCOL (Section 18 - Debugging 50X):**
- **Development Tools:** Hot reload, debugging interfaces, error boundaries
- **Logging System:** Structured logging, log levels, search capabilities
- **Error Tracking:** Sentry integration, error categorization, alerting
- **Performance Profiling:** Memory usage, CPU profiling, network monitoring
- **Testing Tools:** Debug modes, mock data, test utilities
- **Monitoring:** Real-time metrics, health checks, alerting
- **Documentation:** Troubleshooting guides, common issues, solutions

**CREDIT SAVING STRATEGIES (Section 19 - Credit Saving 50X):**
- **Cost Optimization:** Resource usage monitoring, auto-scaling
- **Caching Strategies:** CDN usage, database query optimization
- **Code Efficiency:** Bundle optimization, lazy loading, tree shaking
- **Infrastructure Costs:** Serverless functions, spot instances, reserved capacity
- **Monitoring Costs:** Efficient logging, data retention policies
- **Development Efficiency:** Automation, reusable components, CI/CD optimization

**PLATFORM SELECTION MATRIX (Section 20 - Platform Selection 50X):**
- **Cloud Providers:** Feature comparison, pricing analysis, migration strategies
- **Development Tools:** IDE selection, collaboration platforms, productivity tools
- **Third-Party Services:** Integration options, API reliability, support quality
- **Open Source Alternatives:** Community support, security, maintenance
- **Enterprise Solutions:** Scalability, compliance, vendor lock-in analysis
- **Cost-Benefit Analysis:** ROI calculations, total cost of ownership

**PROMPT LIBRARY (Section 21 - Prompt Library 50X):**
- **Component Prompts:** Reusable UI components, styling patterns
- **Feature Prompts:** Common functionality, integration patterns
- **Architecture Prompts:** System design, database schemas, API designs
- **Testing Prompts:** Unit tests, integration tests, performance tests
- **Deployment Prompts:** Infrastructure setup, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring
- **Documentation Prompts:** API docs, user guides, technical specifications
- **Troubleshooting Prompts:** Debug strategies, error resolution, optimization

**MASTER COMMAND REFERENCE (Section 22 - Command Reference 50X):**
- **Development Commands:** Build, test, lint, format, type-check
- **Deployment Commands:** Deploy, rollback, scale, monitor, logs
- **Database Commands:** Migrate, seed, backup, restore, query
- **Infrastructure Commands:** Setup, configure, update, security-scan
- **Automation Commands:** CI/CD pipelines, scheduled tasks, webhooks
- **Monitoring Commands:** Metrics, alerts, health-checks, performance
- **Security Commands:** Audit, scan, encrypt, access-control

**EXECUTION REQUIREMENTS:**
Execute through the 39-agent OLYMPUS orchestration system, following the 10-phase workflow with complete quality assurance. Deliver production-ready platform with 99.9% uptime, comprehensive testing, and enterprise-grade security. Include all advanced features, integrations, and scalability measures.

**FINAL DELIVERABLES:**
- olympus.dev live platform
- Complete GitHub repository with full documentation
- API specifications and integration guides
- User onboarding and tutorial system
- Admin dashboard with analytics and management tools
- Comprehensive test suite and monitoring setup
- Multi-tier subscription system with billing integration
- Global CDN deployment with edge computing
- Real-time collaboration and AI assistance features
- Mobile apps for iOS and Android
- White-label capabilities and API marketplace
